      • Menu

        public Menu(org.bukkit.entity.Player p,
    java.lang.String name,
    int numberOfSlots,
    org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin plugin)
        Menu object constructor.
        Parameters:
        p - Player involved with this menu.
        name - Name of the menu.
        numberOfSlots - Number of slots in the menu (must be either 0 or a multiple of 9).
        plugin - The plugin instance using this API.
